backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor representing a placeholder backend with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping high‑level features to involved files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference list of prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining pastel OKLCH theme variables and base typography.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading the React app into the root div and linking main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering the TeddyDayCard full-screen.
frontend/src/components/TeddyDayCard/Aud: Renders mute/unmute button and volume slider for background audio control.
frontend/src/components/TeddyDayCard/con: Styling for replay and audio controls with pastel theming and responsiveness.
frontend/src/components/TeddyDayCard/Lov: Shows the love letter text with preserved formatting when visible.
frontend/src/components/TeddyDayCard/ted: Defines full-scene layout, animations, layered effects, and responsive styling for the Teddy Day card.
frontend/src/components/TeddyDayCard/Ted: Orchestrates the animated Teddy Day scene, audio controls, phases, and layered visuals.
frontend/src/components/TeddyDayCard/use: Custom hook creating a looping HTMLAudioElement with play, mute, and volume controls tied to React state.
Manages phased card animations with timed transitions and progress updates, supporting reduced‑motion mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and refreshes a backend actor based on Internet Identity state and invalidates related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's prefers‑reduced‑motion setting via a media query and updates on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend data‑fetching hooks are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Resets layout styles and sets root element dimensions for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, plugins, colors, typography, animations, and layout settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, requirements, and image asset needs for the Teddy Day card app.
